title: Can not connect to PvP Server
body: Been having a problem for the past 2 days now, where I can't connect to the OCE server at all, like I'm stuck at the login page and it keeps coming up with the same message as titled above, is anyone else having this issue? is there any advice/help as to what's wrong? is there any solutions?

replies.body: don't worry guys, everything is resolved now, turns out was from my own stupidity -.- LOL thanks anyways!
on the top link it says, "the webpage can not be found" and on the bottom link it says "this page can not be displayed"...:(

Hey

Can you try opening the following two URLs in a web browser.  If it is working correctly, it should show a blank white page.  Let me know if one/both of these fail to load for you:

* https://lq.oc1.lol.riotgames.com/
* https://prod.oc1.lol.riotgames.com:2099

Cheers!
Mindstar
Also within the last couple of hours I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling, even tried repairing "corrupted" files, still nothing, can't leave/ get past the login menu...
